name: Text-on-image-php
tagline: Create beautiful quotes, affirmations and testimonials from your website!
body:
# text-on-image-php
Using PHP && GD Graphics Library, you can add text to an image to share on Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.
Install it. Get creative. Get more social media exposure!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
